scripts.zip: vite build && cd ./dist/ && bestzip bundle.zip icon/* assets/* src/* canvas-blocks.min.js canvas-grid.umd.cjs favicon.png favicon.svg manifest.json popup.html
scripts.zip-testing: vite build --mode testing && cd ./dist/ && bestzip bundle.zip icon/* assets/* src/* favicon.png favicon.svg manifest.json popup.html
scripts.zip-beta: vite build && cd ./dist/ && mkdir -p pkg && rimraf ./pkg/* && cp -r icon extension-loader.js canvas-blocks.min.js canvas-grid.umd.cjs favicon.png favicon.svg manifest.beta.json popup.html ./pkg && mv ./pkg/manifest.beta.json ./pkg/manifest.json && cd pkg && bestzip bundle.beta.zip ./*
scripts.build-theme: vite build --mode theme && vite build --mode theme-loader && node ./scripts/buildTheme.js
